customType.description: String with the function/first argument to CustomBindingHandler

additionalTypes.description: String with raw typescript. Utilities used in customType

valueType.description:
Type of the input value sent to the binding handler.
a. String with the type used in the binding handler.
b. Object with the function/first argument to CustomBindingHandler

bindingHandlers.description: Map describing all globally accessable binding handlers.
